Audio.Locality: Boa Nova, Wet Forest, state of Bahia
Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Natural songs from a male (same individual as in XC122956) perched about 5m up in small trees along edge of open grassy marsh at valley bottom. Notice the chatters and warbles tacked onto some of these song phrases. Last song's intro was cut off, I tried to repair it by looping one pair of notes (but not a great job).bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Cyclarhis gujanensis,Todirostrum poliocephalum,Megarynchus pitangua,Emberizoides herbicola,Thraupis sayaca
